providers.doc:
Manage Drupal modules via Drush

Required binaries: `drush`.
providers.name: drush

properties.doc: The state the module should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`, `enabled`, `disabled`, `uninstalled`.
properties.name: ensure

properties.doc: Human readable name of the module
properties.name: label

properties.doc: Package the module belongs to  Values can match `/^\S+$/`.
properties.name: package

properties.doc: The the version of the module
properties.name: version

parameters.doc: Site name. Can be set by using a title in the format 'site::module'  Values can match `/^[\.|\w]+$/`.
parameters.name: site

parameters.doc: Name of the module. Can be set by using a title in the format 'site::module'  Values can match `/^[\.|\w]+(::\w+)?$/`.
parameters.name: name

providers.doc:
Manage Drupal themes via Drush

Required binaries: `drush`.
providers.name: drush

properties.doc: The state the module should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`, `enabled`, `disabled`.
properties.name: ensure

properties.doc: Human readable name of the theme
properties.name: label

properties.doc: Package the theme belongs to  Values can match `/^\S+$/`.
properties.name: package

properties.doc: The the version of the theme
properties.name: version

parameters.doc: Site name. Can be set by using a title in the format 'site::module'  Values can match `/^[\.|\w]+$/`.
parameters.name: site

parameters.doc: Name of the theme. Can be set by using a title in the format 'site::module'  Values can match `/^[\.|\w]+(::\w+)?$/`.
parameters.name: name

providers.doc:
Manage Drupal variables via Drush

Required binaries: `drush`.
providers.name: drush

properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.
properties.name: ensure

properties.doc: The value this variable should be set to
properties.name: value

parameters.doc: Site name. Can be set by using a title in the format 'site::variable'  Values can match `/^[\.|\w]+$/`.
parameters.name: site

parameters.doc: Variable name. Can be set by using a title in the format 'site::variable'  Values can match `/^[\.|\w]+(::\w+)?$/`.
parameters.name: name

description:
This is a module that allows you to manage many aspects of a multisite Drupal installation.

Features:

* Facts exposing core Drupal statistics
* Manages Drupal site variables
* Manages Drupal modules in all states. (absent, present/installed, disabled, uninstalled)
* Manages Drupal installation
    * Includes Drush for administration tasks
    * Multiple installation types:
        * Install from repositories
        * Install bundled tarball
        * Download directly from `d.o`
* Manages Drupal subsites (including `default`)
    * Includes vhost and database management if you're lazy
    * Configures `settings.php` for each subsite
        * Allows significant customization, with sane defaults
    * Installs site database with Drush
summary: This is a module that allows you to manage many aspects of a multisite Drupal installation.
author: binford2k
name: binford2k-drupal
